subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Luge Racing
lead_paragraph: The International Luge Federation said sliders competing in December’s World Cup race on the site of the crash-marred Vancouver Olympics would begin from the lower ramps used during those Games.
snippet: The International Luge Federation said sliders competing in December’s World Cup race on the site of the crash-marred Vancouver Olympics would begin from the lower ramps used during those Games.
